overview: 74 B.C. Somewhere in the Roman Empire, Spartacus, a young officer, is condemned to be a slave because he hit a superior. Brought back to Roma in a gladiators' school, he escapes and stirs up all the slaves in a revolt against the Roman Empire.
tagline: Barbaric Splendor! Wanton Revels! A City Mad With Pagan Pleasures!
title: Sins of Rome
